column2: "The cause of Manon's unconsciousness is her constant use of Overboost."
"Overboost is something that puts the body under a great deal of stress."
"Hence, she was instructed to use it sparingly, only in case of an emergency."
"A special power for emergency use only..."
"...Unbelievable."
"I should've tried harder to stop her..."
"I should've kept a closer eye on her..."
"...Sometimes Manon just doesn't listen to stuff like that..."
"Manon was..."
"She was just trying so hard..."
"She talked about how her surveys were making such good progress..."
"And how thankful everyone was for her..."
"I am also partly to blame for this."
"I warned Manon multiple times, but I was unable to get her to listen."
"...Manon."
"Hey, Faria?"
"Manon's gonna be alright, isn't she?"
"If she continues like this, it is difficult to say."
"Could you elaborate?"
"Overboost expends a tremendous amount of Photons each time it is used."

"If she were to completely exhaust her Photon reserves,
she will struggle to regain all of her faculties."
"So, she might not be able to make a full recovery..."
"Correct."
"Do you know how to treat this condition?"
"...I do not."
"Oh... Oh no..."
"Manon..."
"...Would you all hear me out for a sec?"
"What is it?"
"Hearing about Manon's symptoms brought this to memory."
"These are my Grandpa's documents we found in Lost Central."
"There are sections in it about inner Photon deficiency."

"Apparently, in previous wars, there were a number
of ARKS who had used up all of their Photons."
"There's a memo about them undergoing treatment for it."
"So Manon can be healed?!"
"Rysas certainly never fails to impress."
"Well, actually, you see..."
"It pains me to say this, but I wouldn't get too excited just yet..."
"There is a treatment, but apparently it requires a special kind of Photon crystal..."
"It's called a Liminal Sign."
"It's just... There's nothing in these documents about where to find it, or what it even looks like..."
"Liminal Sign... Can't say I've heard of it before."
"Nor have I."
"How reliable is this information?"
"...Mmm, well..."
"These crystals are used in other chemical formulae, so it checks out..."
"But I don't know the exact structure they take."
"...This won't be very easy to find."
"There must be some clues somewhere."
"I'll do whatever it takes if it means saving Manon."
"Y-Yeah!"
"Now that we have something to go on, we should get started!"
"Someone should know something."
"If we retrace our steps, we might find something along the way."
"Should we keep an eye out for something that looks like a Resta Sign?"
"...I guess we should try anything we can think of."
"Yeah."
"I'll see if I can't find some more documents."
"...I will help as well."
"Manon's Survey Team should be more than willing to help as well."
"Alright!"
"Hang in there, Manon!"
